Text:
Thanx! 

This is just as bizarre as it is wonderful.

More to read and listen to here. Mostly in swedish, but there is also an interview with Russel Mael.

http://www.sr.se/sida/gruppsida.aspx?programid=965&grupp=8411

And I would like to say that this can only happen on great public service radio. Three cheers for public service radio and tv!
Why don't you buy the CD instead of stealing a lousy 52,53 MiB file? Bastards. The Mael brothers deserves better than you ripping them off.

This isn't available on CD yet - and some people like to try before they buy!
Tackar!
It seems to be incomplete, the end is missing from it. Anyone having a complete version?
